title: Pho and Hot Pot
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Two vegetable broths for soup are available. Vegetable pho has tofu, mushrooms, bok choy, carrots, other vegetables, and rice noodles. Will make vegan appetizers including summer rolls with peanut sauce and egg rolls with tofu instead of meat. Egg roll wraps are not made with egg. Has a hot pot side of the restaurant where patrons can create their own vegan hot pot with vegetable broth, noodles, and lots of vegetables. Has 2-3 different kinds of tofu available.
